{{comic

| date      = February 22, 2008
| title     = Advanced Technology
| image     = advanced_technology.png
| titletext = We are sexy, sexy Von Neumann machines.
}}

==Explanation==
[[Cueball]] is fascinated by [[Megan]]'s uterusâ€”because it can create a copy of herself (albeit not an identical copy). Despite how advanced technology is, humans still have not been able to create a machine that replicates itself, an accomplishment to which only biological organisms can lay a claim. Judging by Megan's body language, she probably didn't consent to this inspection of her abdomen, and could even be a random woman that Cueball doesn't know personally or only just met.

The title text refers to a {{w|Self-replicating_machine|Von Neumann machine}}, what is usually called "Von Neumann probe" or "Self replicating machine," a machine that would be capable of building a fully functional copy of itself. It just takes sex involving two individuals of a different sex to start the human replication factory.

==Transcript==
:[Cueball is inspecting Megan's abdomen.]
:Cueball: It's neat how you contain a factory for making more of you.
